1.content:
"You're still pissed that I beat you at rummy you little smart ass, Mordora exclaimed."

"NO! it's all your fault because you thought I was flirting with that numb nuts you like so much, Deymona accused."

Following the direction of the noises they walk to......
1.title: What now?

choices: A pineapple under the sea
the Men In Black
an underground hoard of Deymona's hillbilly vampire kin
Gollum with the precious
nothing
11.content:
...the corner of the next building. Mordora lifts her lilac eyes up to the dying fireworks and curses, quickly running behind Deymona. "Get me out of here, you buttbag," she whispers in a panic. Deymona laughs meanly and turns to look at her friend with a nasty come back in mind. Her laughter dies off when she notices a red mark glowing and blinking on Mordora's forehead.

"What the flip, Mordora!? You got some new disease or something?" she asks in a half-assed attempt to hide her shock and worry. Mordora looks up into her friends shadowed face with what seemed to be tears in her eyes.

"It's my parents," she whispers, lips trembling.

Deymona knew little about Mordora's past, only that she was some alien princess. But she had never seen her usually cocky friend scared before. Not of anything. Deymona lifted a tanned hand and knocked twice on a brick in the wall of the building behind them. "Don't worry, Dora," she said fondly as the bricks slid away to reveal...
11.title: An alien monster destroying earth looking for i...

choices: Dora answers "I escaped and fled to earth from an arranged marriage to a slog."
Dora says nothing because a hellbilly rips her throat and drinks her blood.
Answer comes totally outta left field shocking them all, even Dora.
113.content:
Yanking firmly on Dora's arm Deymona tugs her inside. The smell of skunks, iron and copper filled their nostrils. Deymona smiled, "It's good to be home."

"What the hell where have you brought me Mona", Dora stammered?

Before Mona could speak they were met by what appeared to be thousands of people. Looking at them as intruders until Mona says, "Dora, welcome to my hellbilly hideout. These are all my family and kin and children."

"You mean to tell me you're a freaking vampire, Dora spat?"

"You're shocked and you're the weird glowy headed alien princess, freakin weirdo, Mona moaned."

"What's with the strange smell Mona?"

"Oh that is the family secret, mary jane, and blood filled moonshine, two main sources of our secret exsistance, Mona smirked."

Talking and walking they enter a large room filled with containers and liquids that Dora did not want to acknowledge. Heading toward a large table Mona took the master chair and pointed to her friend to sit next to her. In a moment they were met by many others until the table was filled with black eyed pale men and women. "Now Dora what is all that mess outside about, Mona questioned?"
113.title: an underground hoard of Deymona's hillbilly...

choices: Mongra was her husband before the banishment
Mongra is her brother
Mongra killed her lover
1132.content:
Dora opens her mouth to speak but a hellbilly rushes up and rips open her throat and guzzles the blood that spurts from the open wound. The hellbillies start hoopin and hollerin in joy, shouting nasty things about outsiders. Dora rolls her eyes when the hellbilly falls to the ground twitching, surrounded by pools of her purple hued blood. Her wound slowly begins to regenerate flesh. The yells quickly turn angry and Dora turns to her friend. "Do they not realize that your kind are my races mortal enemies!? We have been at war for billions of moons! Our blood is toxic to your race."

Mona cocked her head to the side. "It's not like we have an abundance of your race on this planet, Dora...How would we know? My clan was kicked from the main hoard long, long ago. We are outsiders. Forced to live underground to try to keep out of the radar. Many of our new generation do not even know there are others like us in existence."

Dora was silent as it sunk in that there was much she did not know about her long-time friend. "Why are your parents her anyway, Dora?" Deymona questioned.

Mordora looked at the ground in a moment of shame as she explained, "My father yearned to end the war. He set an arranged marriage to Mongra, the Prince of the main Vampire hoard. I fled in detest of this..."

"MONGRA!" Deymona spat in anger. She tells Mordora..
1132.title: Dora says nothing because a hellbilly rips her ...

choices: Mother, your father stole you from me when you were born.
Halfling sister, we have the same father.
11321.content:
"Mongra more like mongrel she cursed. That dark hearted beast killed my true love, I could not give up my lover even if I was married to Mongra, and then set to slay me as well. He thought it was so for many moons but I suspect that you have brought him straight back into my undead life once more and this time I vow I will rip him to pieces, Mona boasted". Mona looks once more at the now fading glow on Dora's forehead, a glint of realization claims hold of her face and she tries to turn before anyone notices but Dora caught sight and felt very strange.

"Dora, will you follow me," Mona asks waving her hand in the direction of another huge room off to the side.

"What was that look all about Mona, Dora exclaimed."

"This is going to be very hard to say so just sit back and listen, okay?"

"Your father was very powerful and he took joy in claiming females when his army conquered new worlds. It's no secret you know where I am from but what you don't know is this. Mona pulls the leather band from her wrist and shows Dora a similar mark as the one she bears on her forehead. Dora I am your......
11321.title: Mongra was her husband before the banishment

choices: Gather an army
square dance
113212.content:
Halfling sister, we have the same father."

"Son of a monkey!" Mordora cursed, eyes wide as she stared at the mark. "Why the crap did mine have to be on my forehead, that's ridiculous!" She pouted.

Deymona held in a laugh trying to preserve the seriousness of the moment.

"This explains so much," Mordora sighed as she threw herself down into a elaborate victorian styled chair."You caused the war! No wonder I was summoned as a peace offering!"

Deymona delicately perched on a foot stool near Mordora."Everyone has a past." she murmered. "Hoefully you will not hold mine against me...sister."

Mordora eyed Deymona before cracking into a wide grin. "What should we do, then?"
113212.title: Halfling sister, we have the same father.

choices: Dora and Mona slip away to plan a battle.
Mona and Dora find males and sex it up til the next day.
1132122.content:
"It is custom that before great battles we hold dances, and depending upon which one we have determines the kind of battle the kin prepare for, Mona said."

She called out to no one in particular, " Call the square dance, we prepare for battle. Abruptly a thin bearded hellbilly approached the door and shook his head as he roped his long tangled beard. Whoops and wails and whistles echoed in a clamorous manner until every man woman and child old enough to hold a weapon appeared and began to stamp weapons on the ground in unison.

Walking out in the open Mona stood smiling from ear to ear and shouted, " Dora has come home and we will fight to protect my sister without discrimination. Protect her as she is me the queen of all the kin. Some may fall but we will conquer our enemies, Mona declared."

Somewhere in the distance a low hum of strumming instruments began to tune then in an abrupt eruption banjo's fiddle's and hellbilly alike chimed in with music from all around.
1132122.title: square dance

Deymona smiled around at her kin then turned to a servant, "Bring us two males from the slave pit!" She cackled. Mordora followed her sister to two backrooms and they proceded with their activities. Mordora learned just why Deymona was known as Moaning Mona that night as she sat in her seperate room, bored due to to her male winding up being a sheep. She stared at it as it continually ran around the room and shook her head. She got fed up and threw a pillow at it to no avail.

The walls began shaking and she jumped from bed...

113212221.content:
"Hey baby did it hurt, Mongra asked?"

"Did what hurt, Dora asked?"

"When you fell from heavennnnnnnn, Mongra smiled."

"Oh brother, Dora sighed before screaming for Mona to come in the room."

"Are you from Tennessee baby, you must be because you're the only ten I see around here, Mongra chimed."

Mona slanked in dressed only in a sheet and quiet flush, sneered at Mongra. Who by the way wasn't Mongra at all but was Harold who was also a shape shifter. "Just what in the hell is going on here Harold. You can't sex her up so you have to pretend to be someone else? Change now, and get the hell out of here you freak, Mona yelled."

As Mongra trudged to the door he softly whispered to himself, " I only wanted to know about McDonald's and toothpaste," and he closed the door behind him.

"I am sorry Dora that you aren't having a good time. I only thought that it would preoccupy your mind for the night that's all. I really thought this would turn out differently, Mona apologized."

The next morning cam and the girls found it had brought them to...

1132122212.content:
Santa clause burst in, wide eyed and drooling. "Where are the cookies!!!????!?!?!?!" He lifted a hellbilly above his head and snapped it in half. "BRING ME THE COOKIES!!!!"

Deymona sighed and rubbed her temples. This was the last thing she needed after her busy night. Her poor head was pounding. Mordora looked at her friend as she stuffed a whole egg in her mouth. "Who eats cookies for breakfast?" She snorted to Deymona.

Deymona threw her head into the table. "He crashes in here every month or so whe he doesn't get his fix..."

choices: IT'S A HUGE WORM!
Oh no it appears to be a flying monkey.
There is a Chesshire Cat smiling at them.
There are two brother's sitting side by side,calling themselves Brothers Grimm.
It is a flipping mirage get used to it this is a new world you freaks haha.
14.content:
Slipping through the clear shimmering wall, Mona and Dora gasp at one another, for once inside they see huge multicolored mushrooms. Trees as tall as skyscrapers, a path leading across a rather large meadow. Also a figure in the distance that resembled something familiar yet extra large, and a golden road appears and glimmers in the sun. "Damn you Dora for going to bed angry, Mona spat. This is all your fault, where the hell are we now, a land of giants or something?"

Dora giggled, "Look at the size of those shrooms Mona, as she runs up and licks a purple cone shaped mushroom."

Mona grabs at her but barely misses her arm. By the time she does reach Dora something odd starts to happen. "Dora, you're getting spots. You're turning purple with yellow spots, Mona declared."

Dora's giggling abruptly stops and hiccups replace them. "What's...hiccup...Going...hiccup...On...hiccup, Dora cried?

"Serves you right the way you're always running around cramming your unwanted tongue on everything and licking, Mona said disgusted."

"F...Hiccup....F....Hiccup...BLAH! Dora tried to mutter."

Mona held tight Dora's purple arm with the yellow spots and jerked her hiccuping all the way to the figure they had seen when they arrived.
14.title: A portal to another world.

choices: Mordora hiccups
Challenge accepted
144.content:
"Can you get out of our way!?" Deymona asked when they came upon two males sitting side by side in the middle of the road. An archway rose above them and a high wall towered to both sides. "Clearly you are blocking the way, you see."

One of the males looked up and smirked. "Names Grimm, James Grimm," he said as he reached up and slid his flat billed hat backwards.

"Great," Deymona snipped with a frown, "I didn't ask, but great. Now, please move your hind end."

The other male took a second to glance up from a portable game he was playing. "I'm Edward Grimm...I like to eat curds, they keep me thin..."

"Just get out of our way!" Deymona screeched, highly fed up with these guys outright ignoring her.

Mordora hiccuped.

"Don't listen to my bro, he's weird. Dude don't even know how to grow a beard." James replied.

"No, no. My brother there lies, don't listen to his make-shift cries." Edward muttered without looking up from his game.

"If you two don't shut the rhyming and move your rears, you'll both have a boot stuck up em in about two seconds!" Deymona threatened.
144.title: There are two brother's sitting side by sid...

A tornado was blowing toward them and quickly.
A giant man and a giant blue ox was heading toward them.
1443.content:
"I accept this task, even if you don't wear a mask, James Grimm smirked."

"HICCUPPPPP!!!!!"

"What is with the girl does she think she is a spotted squirrel?"

All at once swords were drawn pointed straight at Mona and Dora. The Grimms gazed turned to wonder and fear for Dora worn out and sore from all the air escapes and walking started getting very angry and her forehead began to glow bright as day. Mona just smiled a big fangy grin. "What's the matter boys, haven't you ever saw the likes of us before?"

The Grimms quickly did an about face and started running across a hill to the left of the road. Mona quiet satisfied turned toward Dora still smiling her fang filled smile and her eyes widen huge as she herself turned to pursue the Grimms on the hill to the left. Shouting behind her "Damn it Dora come on quickly."
1443.title: Challenge accepted

info.brief_description: Mix of abnormal things that can happen to Mordora and Deymona after going to bed angry.
info.description:
Standing there in the street Mordora, confused and cold, looked around for any signs of life. It was pitch dark out but ahead she noticed an orange glow. She heads in the direction while still trying to figure out where and how she had gotten here. Rounding a dark building she notices her friend Deymona looking just as puzzled as she and staring at the world in front of them while it burns to the ground.

Rushing to her side Mordora cries "What is going on where and how did we get to this place?"
Then she swipes at clusters of dirt that gathered on her clothes.

Deymona brushes a long thick lock of brown hair from her face as she looks to her friend. "Guess you fell asleep angry again, She replies."

Mordora fidgits with her half crown half tiara so that the knot of blonde hair releases some of the black streaks and says, "Oh really, how do you know it wasn't you miss angry pants?"

         They look at each other when they hear an earth shattering, ear splitting, catastrophic noise ahead before the world lights up again in a firework of arrayed colors.
